name: Issue Template
description: Use this template to submit a request with the required details.
labels: []
body:
  - type: markdown
    attributes:
      value: |
        ## Request Description
        Please provide a clear and concise description of the request.

  - type: textarea
    id: description
    attributes:
      label: Description
      placeholder: Enter the details of the request here.
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: select
    id: priority
    attributes:
      label: Priority
      options:
        - xp:minor
        - xp:normal
        - xp:major
        - xp:critical
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: select
    id: project
    attributes:
      label: Project
      options:
        - P:CB
        - P:DB
        - P:CORE
        - P:PM
    validations:
      required: true

  - type: input
    id: attachment
    attributes:
      label: File Attachment
      placeholder: Upload file(s) relevant to this ticket here.
      multiple: true
